episode_summary: This episode of "No Such Thing As A Fish" covers a range of fascinating topics, including the effects of water pressure on human lungs, the early prediction of online shopping, the etymology of the word 'pants', and the process of emoji approval.

facts.fact: When you are 30 meters underwater, your lungs are only a quarter of their normal size.
The word pants comes from the Greek word for old compassionate.
All new emojis are approved by one 63-year-old man.
